about_me: I’m a maker of things. I’m constantly tinkering and creating - from iPhone apps to model rockets. I love to travel and meet new people. I’m motivated by challenging work and excited about solving real problems.

I live in Seattle, WA and I'm one of the co-founders of Pillsy, a startup devleoping smart pill bottles and solutions to modernize pharmacy. I used to work at Microsoft on the Groove Music app. Before that I lived in Ann Arbor, MI and studied Computer Science at the University of Michigan.
I was born in Indianapolis, IN. In my free time I enjoy sailing and being outdoors.
aspiration: I'm a maker. I dream to change the way people live through technology.
